评论详情: The Libin Women’s Joggers Pants are absolutely amazing! Whether for workouts, running errands, or lounging, these joggers deliver on both comfort and style. The tapered fit is flattering, and the variety of lengths (petite, regular, tall) ensures the perfect fit for everyone.  The material is soft, lightweight, and breathable, making them great for all-day wear. Plus, the pockets are a convenient addition for holding essentials like keys or a phone. They hold up well after washing without losing shape or color.  I highly recommend these joggers for anyone looking for versatile and comfortable workout or casual pants!

These Women's Joggers are perfect for both workouts and lounging! The fabric is lightweight and breathable, making them super comfortable for running, yoga, or just relaxing at home. I love the tapered fit—it gives a sleek look while still offering plenty of movement. The elastic waistband and drawstring provide a snug, adjustable fit. Plus, the pockets are a great feature for carrying essentials like your phone or keys. They hold up well after washing and don’t lose their shape. Whether you're exercising or lounging, these joggers are a great blend of style and comfort!

These pants are so cute.  They fit and flattered and I enjoy wearing them.  I especially like the softness of the them and the fit.  Brown is usually out of stock so when I ordered these I was shocked to get them in 2 days.

评论概述: Nice pant, runs a little big.

评论详情: Nice material and comfortable. The pant fits loose; therefore runs a little big. You may want to size down if your between sizes.

I’m 5’3”, 125lbs, and have tried so many pairs of joggers and they never fit quite right. The medium in these pants are lightweight, smooth, with two mesh-lined front pockets, and a drawstring that actually cinches the waist. The inseam is a great length for my 26.5ish” inseam, giving me a little room to stretch, but not so much that they are baggy at the ankles! I also have a temporary ileostomy, and have had a hard time finding pants that fit under my stoma without feeling really uncomfortable. These pants come up over my butt in the back, but i can easily wear them about 2+ inches under my navel in front, which means they don’t put pressure on my stoma!

Comfortable Fabric: The Libin Women's Joggers Pants are crafted from a lightweight and breathable fabric that feels incredibly comfortable against the skin. The material strikes the perfect balance between softness and durability, making these joggers ideal for all-day wear.  Athletic Tapered Fit: The athletic tapered fit of these joggers is a game-changer. It provides a modern and stylish silhouette without compromising on comfort. Versatility: These joggers are incredibly versatile. Whether you're hitting the gym, going for a run, or just running errands, the Libin Women's Joggers Pants are the perfect choice. The athletic design seamlessly blends with everyday fashion.  Adjustable Waistband: The adjustable waistband is a thoughtful addition, allowing for a customized and secure fit. It ensures that the joggers stay comfortably in place during any activity, providing peace of mind and enhancing the overall wearing experience.  Quality Construction: The quality of construction is evident in the stitching and detailing of these joggers. They are well-made, and the attention to detail speaks to the overall durability of the product. These joggers are built to last through various activities.  Quick-Dry Technology: The quick-dry technology in the fabric is a standout feature, especially for those who engage in intense workouts. It wicks away moisture efficiently, keeping you feeling fresh and comfortable even during the most strenuous activities.  Trendy Design: The trendy design of these joggers adds a fashionable element to your athletic wear. The sleek lines, tapered fit, and modern detailing make them a stylish choice, not just for the gym but also for casual wear.  Size Range: The availability of a wide size range ensures that these joggers cater to a diverse range of body types. This inclusivity is appreciated, allowing more individuals to enjoy the comfort and style of the Libin Women's Joggers Pants.  Affordable Price: Considering the quality of fabric, construction, and the features offered, the price of these joggers is quite reasonable. They provide excellent value for money in the athleisure category.  Overall Recommendation: The Libin Women's Joggers Pants are a standout choice for those seeking comfortable, stylish, and functional activewear. From the lightweight fabric to the athletic tapered fit, these joggers deliver on multiple fronts. Highly recommended for anyone looking to upgrade their athletic and casual wardrobe.

I absolutely love these pants! Super soft and comfortable. I purchased the green and it’s a really pretty green like the picture. Pockets are deep and it fits me well for my curvy body. I am taller so I had to size up for length. I’ve had lots of compliments on them!
These are really soft and comfy!

These are my favorite “lounge” pants. I know they are athletic wear and are meant for more low key activities but they just look so put together. (In a casual way)  I wear them out with friends and to social functions and get many compliments. First of all, the fit is impeccable on these. The drop in the crotch is perfect, has a medium rise but still has full coverage. Length is great, I have normal/ longer legs and the length is perfect. Fits in the leg just how a jogger should fit. These fit like a $100+ jogger pant would.  The fabric is fantastic as well, breathable with a nice amount of stretch, warm but cool as well. I have washed them 15+ times and they still look brand new. I just purchased two more colors in these pants, I will now have four colors. These are the kind of joggers that could be worn as casual professional pants as long as they are a solid color. My favorite print is the green camo but I think that print is out of stock a lot. Just a comment on size. They do run very small. I usually wear and xl but get a 3 xl in these pants. So just size up and don’t be afraid to go up 2 sizes.  Just buy a pair, you will get so much use out of them. I’m sure you’ll come back for more.

评论概述: I really wanted to love these…
评论详情: Imagine that you finally found that perfect pair of joggers.  They don’t fit too baggy.  They aren’t too snug.  They are soft, comfortable, and they not only have functioning side pockets, but a nice little back pocket as well.  Now imagine that these seemingly “perfect” joggers attract every possible piece of lint that has ever and will ever exist in your surroundings.  That is what is happening with these pants.  Not even  your lint roller can save you from these gem of a lint magnet joggers.  Also, I have two pair and they both that random holes in them now.  One in the pocket and the other on my thigh.  Just random holes.  So, while I love the fit and the look, just know that they will collect lint for you (if you’re into that) and they might develop random holes.  Other than that, they’re great.
These are so comfortable and fit very well.

类型: Fit Type: Regular-27.5"Size: X-LargeColor: Dark Grey
评论详情: These pants are super comfortable. Waist isn't so tight that you'll look like a freshly baked muffin without the legs being huge with my tree trunks for legs. Love the pockets but would love them a bit more if there was a zipper as I tend to drop anything in a slit pocket. They're thin and great for summer in the Midwest. I don't love shorts as my thighs like to start fires between them and rip my skin apart because of aforementioned thick thighs, so these are a great alternative. If you want an invisible underwear line probably need a thong or at least seamless underwear. These have washed well but I do air dry them just in case that would shrink/ alter anything.
